thread.title: Airbnb apologizes for San Francisco ad campaign
thread.title_full: Airbnb apologizes for San Francisco ad campaign

title: Airbnb apologizes for San Francisco ad campaign
text:
Airbnb apologizes for San Francisco ad campaign 
CNN Money Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
The company launched an ad campaign Wednesday that suggested how the city should spend the $12 million in hotel taxes that Airbnb pays each year. For example, one ad recommended the tax dollars be used to keep public libraries open later in the evening....
